value.title: Configure data sources for Power BI Reports in Power BI Report Server
value.excerpt: In this video, I show you how you can configure the data source of a Power BI report within Power BI Report Server. value.title: Expand lists in Power BI (also a look at M Syntax)

value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Data source, Dataset and parameters
